title: Excellent Museum
text:
Very large, interesting and beutifull museum worth the visit.
Completely wheelchair accessible and they provide wheelchair for loan during the visit if requested.
The majority of the staff speak English and are very helpfully.

title: Excellent
text:
Beutifull museum, worth the visit, it was very interesting.
Completely wheelchair accessible, and they provide loan wheelchairs as well.

title: Por accessibility for people with mobility issues
text: I have called in advance and was told that I would be provided with a wheelchair but when I arrived at the location I was denied one and had to use my crutches which is difficult and painful to do on the terrain . I was at least allowed to use the lift.
